messages.title: Balancing the budget and investing in the NHS...
messages.content: The Lib Dems in Government have worked to clear up the economic mess left by Labour. They've fought for an extra £2billion for our NHS this year and are committed to delivering a further £8billion a year for the NHS.

messages.title: An £900 INCOME TAX CUT
messages.content: The Lib Dems delivered a £900 income tax cut for local workers. Now they are pushing for a further £300 tax cut.

messages.title: MORE HELP FOR SCHOOLS
messages.content: The Lib Dem 'Pupil Premium' has seen £3 million extra for local schools since 2010. This money has helped with more support - like extra one-to-one tuition to make sure no child is left behind.

messages.title: It's Josh Mason or Labour here...
messages.content: The Conservatives and UKIP are a distant third and fourth here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: JOBS AND PROSPERITY - A stronger local economy

issues.health: The Lib Dems in Government have worked to clear up the economic mess left by Labour. They've fought for an extra £2billion for our NHS this year and are committed to delivering a further £8billion a year for the NHS.

politicalExperience.role: Local councillor; director of a social housing company; a school governor.

endorsements.endorsement: The only people we get voting in this area are the LibDems, even though I am Labour by nature.
The only worth I've had the last three times I've voted has been JOSH MASON.

images.caption: Josh Mason and the Lib Dems are making things fairer in Redcar and Cleveland.
Josh Mason: A record of delivering for Redcar and Cleveland.
Supporters of all parties are switching to Josh Mason...
